knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 skill level - beginner / easy yarn notes six blanket sizes pattern is designed approximate sizes with worsted or aran #4 weight yarn for worsted or aran #4 weight yarn baby 28 wide x 30 long small 30 wide x 36 long for best appearance use a yarn with good stitch definition chenille yarns medium 34 wide x 37 long are not the best option large 38 wide x 44 long xl 42 wide x 46 long pattern looks attractive with solid or xxl 47 wide x 50 long multi-color yarns click to learn about yarn options see page 3 for size modification tips lion brand heartland supplies lion brand basic stitch anti-pilling  worsted or aran #4 weight yarn click here to see more suggestions baby 670 - 700 yards in my blog post about worsted yarns small 850 - 880 yards medium 1000 - 1050 yards large 1300 - 1400 yards xl 1500 - 1600 yards abbreviations xxl 1850 - 1950 yards k knit  us size 8 circular knitting needles 24 - 40 in length p purl or needle size best suited for yarn & knitting gauge st stitch  tapestry needle sts stitches gauge stitch pattern with us size 8 needles about 15 - 16 stitches = 4 exact gauge is not essential however for desired appearance knitting should be fairly tight select needle size that gives the best appearance for your choice of yarn and knitting gauge test gauge by casting on 28 stitches & working in stitch pattern below until work measures about 4 keep in mind that a significantly different gauge may require more or less yarn directions directions for size baby with changes for sizes small medium large xl and xxl in parentheses with us size 8 circular knitting needles cast on 108 sts for baby size blanket small 116 sts medium 132 sts large 148 sts xl 164 sts xxl 180 sts work as follows back and forth on long circular needles to accommodate large number of stitches row 1 *k4 p4 repeat from * end k4 row 2 same as row 1 the pattern is made up of these 2 row repeat row 1 and 2 until blanket is 30 long for baby size small 36 long medium 37 long large 44 long xl 46 long xxl 50 long or desired length 2 meadow lane blanket -
